Vusi Kunene (a mụrụ na 12 Eprel 1966) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na South Africa, nke a maara nke ọma maka ọrụ ya dịka Jack Mabaso na Generations na ịga n'ihu ya, Generations: The Legacy Ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri iri abụọ na ise na ihe ngosi telivishọn kemgbe afọ 1993
N'afọ 2011, ọ natara Golden Horn Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ihe nkiri Soul City
